about-message-1: Thank you for visiting my game website! But please note I do not take any responsibility for correct functionality of this website nor for what can happen to you while playing this game, if you decide to do so.
about-message-2: Please do not search different game names and if you collide pick a new name. Do not ruin fun of others, otherwise you will have to log in
about-message-4: Also I should let you know I am using
about-message-5: so by continuing you agree I am allowed to use them
about-message-6: Lastly, eventhough I do not opose the idea of more than 2 genders, this game does not support it. So if this concerns you I am afraid nothing can be done about it 🤷 .
about-message-7: Drink responsibly and think about your moms!
error-message-1: If you have been playing the game please navigate back to
error-message-2: Otherwise Please navigate to main page
game-detected: Started game within last day was detected, would you like to continue?
py-add-player-fail: Unable to add player. Check the player does not already exist and his name is longer than 2 characters.
py-lobby-failed: Don't be an alcoholic, find at least one other player
py-pub-message-1: You should stop at each pub for one drink, preferrebly pint. You should ideally follow these steps.
py-pub-message-2: Always before leaving pick a new pub.
py-pub-message-3: Check next task on your list.
py-pub-message-4: Follow the task assigned to you.
py-pub-message-5: When someone gets caught breaking the task-rule he should either <u>Drink an extra shot</u> or <u>Buy drink in the next pub to the one, who caught you</u> and continue to follow the task-rule
py-pub-message-6: And lastly have a lovely night out! Enjoy!
task-duo: Players are divided into pairs as follows
